title: Chief Justice Surya Kant Reconstitutes Supreme Court AI Committee
description: CJI Surya Kant has reconstituted the Supreme Court's Artificial Intelligence Committee, assigning it the mandate to steer the adoption, development, and deployment of AI tools across the higher judiciary and subordinate courts
content: Chief Justice of India (CJI) Surya Kant has reconstituted the Supreme Court's Artificial Intelligence Committee, assigning it the mandate to steer the adoption, development, and deployment of AI tools across the higher judiciary and subordinate court... [2383 chars]

title: Nvidia builds location verification tech that could help fight chip smuggling
description: SAN FRANCISCO: Nvidia has built location verification technology that could indicate which country its chips are operating in, the company confirmed on Wednesday, a move that could help prevent its artificial intelligence chips from being smuggled into countries where their export is banned.
content: SAN FRANCISCO: Nvidia has built location verification technology that could indicate which country its chips are operating in, the company confirmed on Wednesday, a move that could help prevent its artificial intelligence chips from being smuggled in... [3250 chars]

title: Google DeepMind Will Open a Robotic AI Lab in the UK to Discover New Materials
description: Google DeepMind will open its first research lab for discovering new materials, like those used in batteries or semiconductors, as part of its push to apply artificial intelligence to more scientific fields.
content:
Google DeepMind will open its first research lab for discovering new materials, like those used in batteries or semiconductors, as part of its push to apply artificial intelligence to more scientific fields.

title: Google DeepMind's Leap into UK Science: AI Lab Revolution
description: Google DeepMind is partnering with the UK to establish an automated science lab, aiming to leverage artificial intelligence. UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer strongly opposes returning to the EU customs union, citing potential disruption to trade deals. UK's energy costs could drop significantly by 2050 due to renewable energy.
content:
Google DeepMind has announced plans to open an automated materials science lab in the UK. This is part of a strategic partnership with the UK government aimed at advancing the country's artificial intelligence capabilities across various sectors.

title: Cisco, once at the centre of dot com revolution, in focus as shares hit record after more than 25 years
description: Thanks in part to the surge in artificial intelligence investment, Cisco Systems Inc., a symbol of the dot-com technology revolution, has hit a record after 25 years. Investors and market analysts are comparing today's Magnificent Seven-led rally to the previous time it reached an all-time high, which coincides with Cisco's ascent to a new record.
content:
On Wednesday, shares increased 0.9% to $80.25, surpassing a peak that had stood for more than 25 years. Up until late 2015, the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 Index reached its peak on March 27, 2000, which many consider to be the peak of the dot-com bubble.

title: Hochul, kill Albany's toxic AI bill - and let Congress set the industry's rules
description: The Responsible Artificial Intelligence Safety and Education (RAISE) Act would require large AI developers to create and publicize safety plans and make tech-sharing impossible.
content:

title: Mumbai To Host 33rd International Sunni Ijtema At Azad Maidan From Dec 12-14
description: The event has historically attracted hundreds of thousands of participants, including women, youth, and international scholars who address contemporary issues through an Islamic lens. This year’s discussions include artificial intelligence, digital finance, and modern trade ethics.
content: Preparations are underway for the 33rd annual international Sunni Ijtema, scheduled from December 12 to 14, 2025, at Azad Maidan, Mumbai. Considered the largest Sunni religious congregation in India, the event is organised by Sunni Dawate Islami (SDI... [3312 chars]

title: Amazon pledges $35 billion for India by 2030, with a quick commerce push
description: Amazon will step up investments in India to $35 billion by 2030 — an increase of about $20 billion from a previously stated commitment — as it ramps up 10-minute delivery and doubles down on other businesses, said Amit Agarwal, its senior vice-president for emerging markets. The latest investment pledge follows an announcement two years ago that it would plough in $15 billion by 2030. A large part of that--around $12.7 billion--was toward artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud infrastructure through Amazon Web Services (AWS).
content:
Synopsis
